Heading: Time period
Note: The price condition quantity represents a time period

Heading: Number of updates
Note: The price condition quantity is a number of updates

Heading: Number of linked products
Note: Use with Price condition type 06 and a Quantity of units. Price is valid when purchased with a specific number of products from a list of product identifiers provided in the associated <ProductIdentifier> composites. Use for example when describing a price for this product which is valid if it is purchased along with any two from a list of other products
